General.Name: Beijing Yuanlong Yato Culture Dissemination Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Yuanlong Yato Culture Dissemination Co.,Ltd. provides integrated marketing services and marketing material solutions in China, Hong Kong, and Macao. The company engages in the planning and supply of promotional gifts; digital marketing planning and execution, such as consumer CRM, channel CRM, etc.; new media advertising planning and ad serving, including advertising planning, content realization, and KOL serving; and Metaverse Technology Marketing, etc. It also offers creative proposals, product design, research and development, production, quality control, warehousing, logistics, and distribution services, as well as digital promotion management and operations. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: CTS (HK) Grand Metropark hotel Ofc Bldg, Beijing, China, 100053
